location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to the Garrison Paymaster, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing an audit abstract of batta (not present) to the Marine Guard at the Bushire Residency for February 1812, along with a bill (also not present) for the embarkation of the Madras Horse Artillery, store lascars, and artificers.
